cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the encoding and decoding of Reed-Solomon erasure codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed polynomial basis improves the arithmetic complexity of addition, multiplication, and the determination of polynomial degree, which are fundamental operations in computer science (cs.DS, cs.DC). The paper also discusses the efficiency of the algorithms and their practical applications, which are topics in systems and control (cs.SI) and computational complexity (cs.CC).
